title: Priestly Garments
summary: Exodus 28 details the garments for Aaron and his sons, who will serve as priests. These include the ephod, breastplate, robe, turban, and sashâ€”all designed to reflect holiness and beauty.

faq.question: What was the ephod?
faq.answer: A sacred vest worn by the high priest, with stones bearing the names of the tribes of Israel.

faq.question: What was the breastplate of decision?
faq.answer: A square piece containing twelve stones representing the tribes, used in making decisions before God.
